Article.ArticleTitle: A new sesquiterpene glycoside from the aerial parts of Saussurea triangulata.

AbstractText: Column chromatographic separation of a MeOH extract of the aerial parts of Saussurea triangulata led to the isolation of a new sesquiterpene glycoside 6, together with three quinic acid derivatives, two phenolics, two sesquiterpene glycosides and two flavonoids. The new compound 6 was identified as amarantholidol A glycoside by spectroscopic and chemical methods.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Natural Products Laboratory, College of Pharmacy, Sungkyunkwan University, Suwon 440-746, Korea.
